resources.string:
Hi, my name is Dave. 

I love my kids and the outdoors. 

I like to play softball and snowboard when I am not coding 

We will soon be camping at Jellystone campground over the holidays.

 

From what I can tell, my babies like sport

 

which to me is nice because we share something in common.

 

If tickets to sporting events were not so expencive,

 

We would go see the Colorado Rockies, Colorado Avalanche,

 

and the Denver Broncos.

 

I would also someday like to see the Carolina Panthers
